In the future, they will live in certain big houses, when their husbands come back, they will prepare certain dishes. Neither of them are backing down... First Grade Summer Vacation The last day of summer vacation, it's unfortunately raining, but Bunji, who is wearing a raincoat, plays feverishly. Mom kind of understands Bunji's feelings.

114.TitleEnglish: A Special Day / Growing Up / Farewell / Cat Daughter
114.SummaryEnglish: A Special Day New clothes and a lot of presents! Fumi is very happy, while Bunji, who looks at them, gets very annoyed. That's right, today is Fumi's first day of school entrance ceremony. A new spring has arrived at the Kamohara family. Growing Up Bunji, who has gone up to the next grade, is in the same class as his good friends Ma, Chi, Daichi, Chinatsu and so on. Bunji feels relieved. Meanwhile, the teacher is deciding on the committee members, but... Farewell Bunji, who is now in the third grade, gets upset when the girls talked casually. Bunji tries to call upon his imaginary friend, Aso, who does not appear right away... Cat Daughter The much-loved dog of the Kamohara family, Jon, has left the family to marry and live with Mary. Meanwhile, Fumi, who loves cats, pesters Mom to get a cat as usual...

115.TitleEnglish: My Kisses / Gals / My Brother / Grandmother Friends
115.SummaryEnglish: My Misses Mr. Mizunuma, who is in charge of Mom, looks different. Of course, he has to be, since the other day he got married and is in the middle of his newlywed life. Gals Fumi, Kanna and Yuki, who have become elementary school students, gathered with only girls in the room and enjoyed talking about whatever. Their topic naturally became the stupid boys in their class. My Brother Kiku and Tora are the two cats that have come to the Kamohara family. Compared with Kiku, who is very tame, Bunji got to be in charge of Tora, since he is more troublesome. CGrandmother Friends Grandma is at the hospital, and her good friends Sakie and Iyo, started a very heartfelt conversation. That's right, the three of them are not "mom friends" but "grandmother friends."

116.TitleEnglish: Ladies Package / Glasses / Flexible / First Grade
116.SummaryEnglish: Ladies Package Grandma and Fumi have come to a spa resort. Grandma complains about everything and Mom gets ticked off over time... Glasses Bunji's best friend, Chi, is acting strange. What happened is Chi's eyesight has become poor and he has to wear glasses from now on. He was embarrassed and was not able to wear them. Flexible Bunji, who is in the third grade, is hopeless when it comes to studying. Chi has started to go to cram school and Mom is in a dilemma over whether to send her son to one as well. That's when the early stage education spirit shows up. First Grade Fumi, who is in first grade, is starting to act more like a big girl.

117.TitleEnglish: Grown Up? / Trendy Things / Dreams, Short Lived / Look Like Dad
117.SummaryEnglish: Grown Up? Mom is in a big rush as it's close to the deadline. That is when Bunji popped in and started to play. Bunji kept on barging in and pestering Mom to play with him. Mom accidentally had a slip of the tongue... Trendy Things Chinatsu pointed out Bunji's t-shirt being tucked in and said it looked uncool. Bunji decides to tuck his shirt in. With Ma and his friends, they tried the trendy "low pants" look out... Dreams, Short Lived Love is something that appears out of nowhere... Fumi falls in love with her classmate who is good at soccer. At home, she acts like a young girl who gives off a pink aura and her Dad sheds tears... Looks Like Dad When Fumi was young, she got mad when people said that she looked like her Dad. It seems she doesn't like the idea of comparing a middle-aged man to a young girl...

118.TitleEnglish: Horse and Deer / Cram School / In your Eyes / Do You Know Where My Shoes Are?
118.SummaryEnglish: Horse and Deer Bunji and Ma are at home doing homework together. When Mom observes the two of them, the two of them just keep on showing the same level of stupidity... Cram School Chi, who has gone to cram school first, has caused Mom and her friends to decide their children should go to cram school too. But there's an examination before entering the cram school. Complete Loss to Your Eye Dad's ideal man, that is, dandyism and wildness, a man back in those old days... In an imaginary world, Dad starts to act like one, but... Do You Know Where My Shoes Are? One autumn morning, Dad woke up and felt like going for a walk. When he got to the doorway, there was a pair of shoes that he didn't recognize. There are no guests and they aren't his either. Just what is going on...

119.TitleEnglish: Cat's Characteristics / Field Trip / Complete / Unpokopi
119.SummaryEnglish: A Cat's Characteristics Two cats have joined the Kamohara family. The male Tora likes to do things at his own pace. The female Kiku has a good relationship with Dad. One day, Dad ate Kiku's food, and strange things start to happen. Field Trip Fumi, who has moved on to the first grade is on her first field trip. Kanna, Yuki, cool looking Masa, and bad Takashi are having fun in the bus as usual, but thirty minutes later, something happens... Complete Mr. Mizunuma who is in charge of Mom's publication, is a figure collector. As he is not able to keep them at home, he asks Mom to put them at her work place, and... Unpokopi Right now, Bunji and his school mates are into the Unpoko dance. It was first done by a TV comedy show, but it somehow has managed to get into the elementary school and right now it's a huge trend.

120.TitleEnglish: Small Pentagon / Heart Pentagon / Dream Boyfriend / Sleeping Alone
120.SummaryEnglish: Tiny Pentagon It has been one month since Bunji started to go to cram school. Mom looks at the pentagon graph, where it shows the strengths and weaknesses of five different subjects. That's when the Early Education Spirit appears. Heart Pentagon Mom thought Bunji is studying for his test, but he turns out to be doodling. Mom was about to tell him off, but that is when a Love Spirit that looks like Dad appears! Dream Boyfriend The street down by the seaside. A red convertible sports car dashes down the road. There's a cool looking blond guy in the driver's seat. And then in the passenger seat, Fumi...? Sleeping Alone A story that happened a little while ago. Bunji and Fumi usually sleep together, but as Bunji's snoring is too loud, both of them tried to sleep by themselves...

121.TitleEnglish: Leggings Guys / Pajamas / Folding Into Triangles / Division
121.SummaryEnglish: Leggings Guys One day, Ma came in wearing leggings under his pants. The word has a pleasant ring to Bunji's ears and he got fascinated by it. When he got home, he bugged Mom because he wanted to wear them. Pajamas Mom got to a party that the company organized. When Mom was about to deposit her coat at the cloak room, she realized that she was still wearing her pajamas. She tried to get out of the situation, but... Folding Into Triangles Fumi loves to fold supermarket plastic bags into triangles. She folds them with Mom. but as Mom's deadline is close, she can't stick around with Fumi. A while later, Mom checks out what Fumi has done. Division Mom's Life style math study time has arrived! Today's theme is division! Can you answer the questions that Mom asks?!

122.TitleEnglish: Class News / Present? / Early Afternoon / Life... What is it?
122.SummaryEnglish: Class News Bunji and his friends, the four stupid boys, are in charge of creating a class newsletter. Mom gives the advice "you can't do the same things as others" and "gather it with your feet" so the four of them walk down the street... Present? In this world, there are some things that boys do that girls don't understand. This story starts when Fumi gets a monster drawing from Jo who only plays scissors... Early Afternoon One early afternoon, Dad is sitting on a bench and a salaryman slowly sits down. On one side is Dad, who is wearing shorts and sandals, while on the other hand the salaryman is wearing a suit. There is a weird atmosphere, but... Life... What Is It? Mom is sick with a cold. Looking for someone to look after her, she talks to Bunji since he is home, but he asks "What is life?" and "Why do I have to study everyday?" He brings his thoughts to Mom.

123.TitleEnglish: Class Visit / Carry / Deep Friend Chicken Power / Complicated
123.SummaryEnglish: Class Visit Mom and her friends have come to visit Bunji's class. Today is a moral education class, so maybe they won't expose their stupidity too much? That's what they were hoping for, but... Carry While Mom listens to the story of a young mom who lives in the neighborhood, she remembers the time when Bunji and Fumi were little. She remembers when she had to carry them around or they wouldn't sleep... Deep Fried Chicken Power Bunji is in the backyard digging, and he kept on digging. That is a sign that he's not feeling well, so that is when Mom and Dad try to do this and that to get him back, but... Complicated Fumi throws her frustration to Mom because she got bullied in class. "Why did she bully me?" As Mom listens to Fumi's story, she remembers a time when she had something similar happen to her...

124.TitleEnglish: Grandmas are Strong / Transfer Student / First Grade and Sixth Grade / Everyone Together
124.SummaryEnglish: Grandmas Are Strong Grandma and her best friends, Sakie and Iyo, gathered together to discuss what books to read at the children's gathering. In one of the discussions, one said that she would like to sleep like Snow White... Transfer Student In Bunji's class, there is a new transfer student named Minoru. Bunji tries to look after him but his attitude is difficult. Bunji decides to follow Minoru after school... First Grade and Sixth Grade Fumi has recently become good friends with Sho who is in sixth grade. When she becomes friends with her, she has started to grow and become a big girl, but... Everyone Together Mom and her family, all four of them, have come to a department store. Dad always gets excited, but Bunji and Fumi are used to it. Dad decides to raise the stakes and...

125.TitleEnglish: Fortune Telling / Boxed Lunch / Strawberry, An Encounter / Chip Off the Old Block
125.SummaryEnglish: Fortune Telling In Bunji's class, fortune telling is becoming quite big with the girls, and it seems that Bunji and Chinatsu are the most compatible no matter what fortune telling method is used. With that, Chinatsu is to go over to Bunji's place, but... Boxed Lunch It's a day where the whole school has a sketch competition. Fumi is not so good at drawing. In order to make herself feel better, she gets Mom to make her a character boxed lunch. When she opens the cover, Bunji's exciting lunch is inside! Strawberry, An Encounter Meanwhile, Bunji and his friends stopped sketching and went out to play. Getting lost at a strawberry farm, they got caught by an old man farmer and Bunji didn't manage to escape. DNA Recently, Bunji has started to resemble Dad. If he grows up to be an adult, there's one thing to do: play ball! So says Dad, who's excited...

126.SummaryEnglish: First While the TV is showing a couple of athletes on the podium, Dad tells Bunji "Whatever you aim for, you have to be first! There's a big difference between first and second!" The next day, Bunji heads off to school to be first and does other things. Snow Woman In the next fun meeting, there's a class play, and Fumi gets to play the role of Snow Woman. She's all excited over it, but when she watches Snow Woman in a scary TV program, she completely loses interest in doing it. Considerate Recently, even though Grandma is doing her usual things and doesn't get bothered, there are plenty of times where others go out of their way to be considerate. Today, on the bus, and at the park as well ... Concentrate Being tied down to a tight schedule, Mom has to concentrate on her job. If she stays at home, it's too noisy for her, so that's why she tries to escape to a family restaurant or a coffee shop, but...

127.TitleEnglish: Husband and Wife Argument / Cell Phone! / Sexy Duo / Album
127.SummaryEnglish: Husband and Wife Argument Mr. Mizunuma is waiting for Mom's work. It should be close to the deadline, yet he's not edgy. It looks like it's the early days of marriage - he's worrying about a husband and wife argument. When Mom listens to his worries... Cell Phone! Chi got a cell phone and Bunji bugs Mom for one. He gets told that he's too young and she doesn't get him one. Meanwhile, Bunji and Chi send each other messages through Mom's cell phone... Sexy duo While looking for cute clothes at a shopping mall, a young girl comes over and says "Sis, want to have debut with me?" Mom wonders about it but Fumi thinks "it's not bad" and gets excited... Album Dad and Mom are in the middle of arranging photos for albums. Bunji's photos get sorted and he has two albums. On the other hand, Fumi has fewer photos and doesn't even have one full album.

128.TitleEnglish: Part Time / Women's Skills / Let's Go To Kyoto! / Cats and Mom
128.SummaryEnglish: There's something that Bunji wants so badly, so that's how he started off doing part time work at home. Cleaning the toilet and bath, every time he does one task, he gets 50 yen. A happy Bunji got worked up, but... Women's Skills Kanna and Yuki both seem to be able to cook by themselves. Fumi was surprised by this and said that she wanted to make beef stroganoff. Mom has her hands full with work and gets Ai to do it, but... Let's Go To Kyoto! hinking deep thoughts, Dad decides to go on a trip by himself. Dad enjoys sightseeing during the daytime and decides to splurge at night at an inn. But because he's not a familiar customer, he gets refused and has trouble finding one... Cats and Mom Mom is home by herself, working at her own pace. Kiku the cat keeps on bugging her so Mom plays with her. Then Tora comes in. The cats keep playing around and having fun, but...

129.TitleEnglish: Trauma / Grandma's Cell Phone / Reality is Stranger Than Fiction / Turning the Screws
129.SummaryEnglish: Trauma Bunji and Fumi are in the bath when a the power goes out. Actually, Fumi hates dark and small places. When Bunji sees Fumi crying, he tells her that he will be right back after finding a flashlight and goes out looking for one... Grandma's Cell Phone Bunji still wants a cell phone and he gets to borrow one from Grandma. When he's playing around with it with Chi, Grandma's friend Sakie gives it a call... Reality Is Stranger Than Fiction When Mom runs out of ideas for her manga, she gets out to the streets and observes people. There are as many dramas as the number of people out there. Turning the Screws All of a sudden, Bunji starts to turn a lot of screws on lots of things with a screwdriver. He could turn out to be an engineer. That's what Dad and Mom hoped for, but...

130.TitleEnglish: One Day Love / Sumo Santa / Grandma's Taste / Letting Children Go
130.SummaryEnglish: One Day Love Fumi is putting a lot of effort into handmade cookies. She says that they're a Christmas present for an older classmate hat she admires: Takahiro. She even wrapped them up with cute wrapping paper and gives it to him, but... Sumo Santa Mom and her friends as well as their children have gathered at the Kamohara house for a Christmas party. While the moms are boasting about the chicken dishes they made at home from leftovers, Dad, who feels like he doesn't have a place to go, keeps on walking... Grandma's Taste Fumi and Mom argued and both of them shut themselves in their rooms. But when Grandma cooks nostalgic caramel cookie in the kitchen, Mom gets lured by the sweet smell... Letting Children Go Lately, there are times when Mom feels lonely. Times when the children go straight back to their room right after dinner, times when Mom feels that Bunji's shoes are unusually large...

131.TitleEnglish: Otoshidama / Screaming For the First Time / This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles Every Day, Too / Adult? Child?
131.SummaryEnglish: Otoshidama This year on New Year's day, the Kamohara house is very lively since Mom's brother has come up from Kochi with his family. Inside the house, the boys are getting excited over otoshidama while Fumi is standing... Screaming For the First Time Mom's brother and Dad have taken the children to the amusement park. But the two of them actually don't like roller coasters. They try to avoid getting into the machine, but... This Year Will Be a Bowl of Noodles a Day, Too Bored with the usual New Year's food, Mom and the family have come to a private room at a restaurant. But Bunji and his cousin couldn't wait for the courses so they played games and read manga. They just couldn't sit still. Adult? Child? Mom yells at Dad who is lying on the floor, saying that he's like a child. Dad uses those words and says that he's a child! And he's about to find out the limits of how much freedom he can have...

132.SummaryEnglish: Stomach Mom is busy preparing for Bunji's birthday party. Bunji said that Ma, Chi, Daichi and the others will be coming. The usual friends have arrived, but for some reason the door bell keeps on ringing. Moms Bunji is reading manga in a convenience store when his classmate Louis, a foreigner, comes in. Louis gives him 1000 yen and says that it's his present so he can buy the manga. Daughter Fumi is going away to a winter camp for three days. This is the first time that Fumi will be away for so long and Mom is feeling uneasy. Meanwhile, Fumi... Maiden Club Grandma, Sakie and Iyo, the three good grandmother friends, are meeting to discuss the next round of reading material. Out of the blue the three of them decide to come up with ideas to name their club, but...

133.TitleEnglish: To Kyushu / In Nagasaki / Zashiki-warashi / We're Back
133.SummaryEnglish: To Kyushu Mom and her family have gone to Kyushu for a family vacation. Dad takes them around and the first place they go is in Hakata to have the real Hakata ramen. "It's delicious!" While everyone is impressed, Dad has a slightly different response. In Nagasaki Even in Nagasaki, Mom and her family have gone to have champon and see Dejima. While they are enjoying the trip, when Mom turns around, her handbag is nowhere to be seen! Zashiki-warashi At Kagoshima, Mom and her family have decided to stay one night at an inn. At the inn, Bunji gets lost and he coincidentally meets a girl smaller than Fumi. He gets along with her and starts having fun, but... We're Back Going to Ibusuki's sand bath and enjoying the glass-making class. A lot has happened, but a family trip is really good. That's what they thought when they traveled back. At home, Grandma and Ai are waiting.

134.TitleEnglish: Small Pride / Children are Mirror Images of Parents / Honest and Healthy / Style
134.SummaryEnglish: Small Pride Bunji and Ma are doing the Unpoko Dance but Chi is the only one who staying back and watching. When Mom asks Chi why he's not doing it, he ran to the toilet... Children Are Mirror Images of Parents Even though they are in elementary school, the fighting never stops, and Mom gets angry at Bunji and Fumi. When Dad walks by, she tells him to do something about it. When he hears about it, he does so reluctantly, and Mom's anger turns to him. Honest and Healthy Today, Mom is at the center of the topic of talking about children. Boys are stupid, yet being honest and healthy is more important. While that opinion has started to dominate, the powerful Mrs. Gonda says something else. Style When Mom goes out with her usual clothes, Fumi stops her and tells her that it's ugly to walk out in such clothes. And Fumi starts to coordinate what to wear, but...

135.TitleEnglish: Looking After the House / To Be Continued / Playing in Snow / Thank You
135.SummaryEnglish: Looking After the House There is a day when Bunji and Fumi are looking after their home until the late afternoon. Both of them eat pudding, play games, and have fun by themselves, but Fumi starts to feel a bit lonely... To Be Continued Mom continues to be disappointed with Bunji's poor results. That is when the relaxed education spirit appears. When the spirit says that a good university and good job don't mean everything, Mom can't argue, but... Playing With Snow There is a day with a big snowstorm. Dad invites Bunji and Fumi to a snowball fight, but the two of them are not interested. That's when Dad gets a hold of Mom, who is stuck with her manga ideas, for a change of atmosphere, and gets her to play in the snowball fight, but... Thank You When Mom was a child,she wanted to be an adult. It seemed to her at the time that she would be able to doanything she wanted and could go anywhere she wanted. But time just doesn't pass at all...

136.TitleEnglish: Like a Stray Dog / Dotted Hankerchief / Big Collaboration / Mini Festival
136.SummaryEnglish: Like A Stray Dog Bunji has met Taiga, who is five years older than him, and whom he hasn't seen for a while. He was heavily influenced by his bad boy behavior. A stray dog lies around and he says that if it gets tamed, it's over, but... Dotted Handkerchief Fumi has a favorite dotted handkerchief. There's a jinx that if she carries it around, she will get along with anyone. Carrying that, she was about to confess her love to an upperclassman, but when she sees one of her classmates is going to be transferred to another school... Big Collaboration Bunji is supposed make an art piece in a group using paper mache. But everyone wants to make their own — a fire truck, a dinosaur, a castle — and what they want to make don't match, so they each started to make on their own...

137.TitleEnglish: Stamp / Story of a Spirit / Father and Daughter / Similar Couple
137.SummaryEnglish: There's a stamp boom in the Kamohara family. If someone does a good thing for Mom, they get a stamp, and if you receive thirty of them, Mom will get you anything. The sentimental spirit appears in front of Mom after a long absence, but he's got a lot more grey hairs and he's clearly depressed. A day when Dad and Fumi are looking after the house. Dad doesn't realize that Fumi is a bit lonely on the inside.The Kamohara family pets are Jon the dog and Kiku and Tora, the cats.

138.TitleEnglish: Ways of Raising Husbands / Star - Bunji / Wiener / Mom Birthday
138.SummaryEnglish: Ways of Raising Husbands Snack Moms are still in business. Tonight's topic would be "talking about husbands." While the five of them talk about themselves raising their children, the words that Mugi said were... Star - Bunji In Grandma's room. Grandma's good friends, Sakie and Iyo, have come to chat. Bunji brings them snacks and gets caught by the two of them telling him that he's a handsome man, he's interesting, and so on. He doesn't feel that he's being ill-treated. Wiener Fumi has always loved Mom's poorly-made wiener octopuses. The reason why she calls them Wiener is because, to her, they're her precious friends that will save her from a tight spot. Mom Birthday To moms, their children's birthday are like their birthdays too. Speaking of which, Mugi's twins' birthday is coming up soon, so it looks like Mom is coming up with a plan...

139.TitleEnglish: Cat's Hand / A Child's Heart Parent Doesn't Know / Shiritori / Grandfather's Glasses
139.SummaryEnglish: Cat's Hand Mom is pulling an all-nighter. She puts in all her effort and faces the table but there are two cats on it: Kiku and Tora are lying on it. She keeps on getting disturbed by them and when she tries to get rid of them... A Child's Heart: Parent Doesn't Know Mom and Bunji play hard in an arcade. Mom is feeling high-strung the whole time, crunching on snacks, eating right outside an outdoor store, and so on, and she drags Bunji along. Shiritori Bunji and Fumi started a game of shiritori. The entire conversation has become shiritori. And after some time, Dad, Mom, and Grandma got involved too... Grandfather's Glasses From an unexpected source, Fumi starts thinking about what death is. She wonders if people become stars when they die. When Mom sees her, she brings out her memento of her late grandfather, his glasses, and starts talking to her.

140.TitleEnglish: Carnivorous Boys / Lonely Driver / Arrival of Crisis! / Two Bowls of Noodles a Day
140.SummaryEnglish: Carnivorous boys On the day of Bunji's karate promotion competition, Mom, who overslept, hastily came up with a simple bento. She felt sorry for Bunji, so during lunch time, she brought in a bit of food. What she saw in everyone's bento... Lonely Driver Dad, who thought he would be able to enjoy a drive by himself, ending up taking Mom, Fumi, and Grandma - three women - shopping. Dad gets shuffled around by the women's pace... Arrival of Crisis! Dad and Mom argued over a small thing. Both of them refuse to back down and when Bunji and Fumi saw it, they... Two Bowls of Noodles a Day Dad and Mom are still in the middle of an argument. Bunji and Fumi try to think of ways to make them reconcile, and use all their brain cells, but it just doesn't work well...

141.TitleEnglish: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born / A Man's Hamburger / Men's Secret / Taking a Day Off From School
141.SummaryEnglish: The Day a Baby Boy Was Born This is the day when Bunji was born, some time ago. Dad, who is trying to reach the maternity ward, keeps on meeting people who need help. Because he's going to be a father, Dad couldn't just leave them alone. A Man's Hamburger Dad said that he's going to make man's hamburgers. This is something that Dad learned while he was working part time and a dish that women and children are not allowed to help with! A Men's Secret Bunji and his friends are hanging out in his room. When Dad takes a quick look inside, he sees women posing and sketches of women! Dad panics and swears he'll protect the secret. Taking a Day Off From School When Mom was small, she often had to take days off because she was sick. When that happened, her mom would make pureed apples for her. When Mom thinks about it, half of that sweetness is because her mom would be nicer to her than usual...

142.SummaryEnglish: The End Socks Today Mom and her mom friends are having Snack Moms. Tonight's topic is "why does only one of the pair of the males' socks disappear?" Every household has its own sad stories. Colorful Recently, Fumi has started to help out at home. White and Black Fumi have appeared to talk about her, and when they started to argue, that is when the colorful Fumi appears! Forever Mom Mom is always busy with housework. Bunji and Fumi play with their friends, cry, laugh and so on. Dad is always cheerful, Grandma is always annoying. What doesn't change on a daily basis is...
